name: 2 Player Pixel Games
description:
2 Player Pixel Games is a two player versus game for your iPhone and iPad! Defeat your friends while playing simultaneously on the same device.
There are 5 mini games:
Battle your friends in “Lumberjack Mayhem”, get your customers across the street in "Ice cream seller" , test your timing skills in “Whack the Gnome”, run, jump and fly in “Bird Dash”, or defeat your opponent in the action game “Bandit shooter” .
You can also play the pixel cup to decide who is the best!

Features:
• Everybody can play
• Simple one button controls
• Fun multiplayer gameplay
• 5 different games
• Play the Pixel Cup
• Challenge your friends and family
• Online Highscore Leaderboard ("Bird Dash")
• Arcade retro style
